name: AmazingChartsProofofConcept
0:
”Alexa, open amazing charts”
”Alexa, tell amazing charts how many patients am i seeing today”
”Alexa, tell amazing charts what is the next appointment on my schedule”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amazing charts
des: The Amazing Charts Proof of Concept application will demonstrate simple voice interaction on a connected Alexa Device. After opening the application, the you may say one of a few stock questions. For example you can ask "how many patients am i seeing today". If you ask a know question, the application will respond with a stock answer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
